First of all, welcome to the official website of PeanutHost!
Really excited to finally have a proper website. It’s clean, fast, stable, and fully under my control, exactly how I’ve always wanted it.

content:
A solo-built platform for managing game servers, currently in active testing. Everything is designed with stability, speed, and future scalability in mind.
Built as a passion project, this platform is my attempt to create a better game hosting experience, minimal, efficient, and fully under my control.
What you‚Äôre seeing is just the beginning.

content:
This website is proudly built and hosted using free and open source software:
Hugo (Static Site Generator / Website Framework) Blowfish (Site theme for Hugo) Debian GNU/Linux (Server operating system) Nginx (Web server) Let’s Encrypt (Free TLS certificates for HTTPS) Thank you to the communities behind these projects. ‚ù§Ô∏è
